subject: Coaches and Managers
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Guus Hiddink will replace Louis van Gaal as coach of the Netherlands after the World Cup, coach through the 2016 European Championship and then be replaced by Danny Blind.
snippet: Guus Hiddink will replace Louis van Gaal as coach of the Netherlands after the World Cup, coach through the 2016 European Championship and then be replaced by Danny Blind.
